Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Jnr \Jnr.\ n. Abbreviation for Junior, used after a name by a son who has the same first and last name as his father; -- less commonly used than {Jr.}
Syn: Junior, Jr. [WordNet 1.5]
Jr n : a son who has the same first name as his father [syn: {Junior}, {Jnr}]
jr. adj : used of the younger of two persons of the same name especially used to distinguish a son from his father; "John Junior"; "John Smith, Jr." [syn: {younger}]
